mdRecord.dcterms:title: George Newman, Professor, Storer College, Harpers Ferry, W. Va.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Portrait of African-American professor and coach, George Newman. He graduated from Lincoln University with a degree in Pharmacy, and was a Professor of Chemistry and Biology at Storer College. He was also the head football coach.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: African American college students
